text: (appōtu) avarkaḷ, "ivaṉ (atait) tiruṭiyiruntāl ivaṉuṭaiya cakōtaraṉ (yūsuḥpum) muṉṉāl niccayamāka tiruṭiyirukkiṟāṉ" eṉṟu (taṅkaḷukkuḷ) kūṟikkoṇṭārkaḷ; (icceytikaḷaic ceviyēṟṟum) avarkaḷiṭam veḷiyiṭātu yūsuḥp tam maṉatukkuḷ maṟaittu vaittuk koṇṭār; avar"nīṅkaḷ tarattil iṉṉum tīyavarkaḷ; (ivar cakōtararum tiruṭiyiruppār eṉṟu) nīṅkaḷ varṇikkiṟīrkaḷē atai allāh naṉṟāka aṟivāṉ" eṉṟu (tamakkuḷḷē) collik koṇṭār
